pli-tv-pvr2.11:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.1: Because of consenting to physical contact, of the four fallings away how many fallings away do the offences … appertain to?
pli-tv-pvr2.11:1.3: there may be falling away from moral habit; there may be falling away from good behaviour …
pli-tv-pvr2.11:2.1: Because of partaking of curds, having had them asked for … do the offences appertain to?
pli-tv-pvr2.11:3.1: Concluded is the Third Chapter: on Falling Away
